name: MILDAS - Space Adventure
description:
MILDAS - Space Adventure

MILDAS is the name of your ship and you'll have to destroy all enemies and asteroids during your space adventure.

THIS GAME IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT (Alpha Test), so it's normal to be buggy and all the things won't work yet, but hey it will be regularly updated :)

CONTROLSKeyMovementW,A,S,D or Arrow keysRoll over/ImmuneSpacebarShootLeft Mouse ButtonPause P or ESC

The goal of the game is to get highest score possible.

Known bugs / things to improve

  1. Max reachable score for now is 2500 (plan is to be limitless)
  2. Special skill (Right mouse button) not implemented 
  3. Still a lot of work with In-game UI/HUD
  4. Missing a lot of visual and audio effects
  5. Submit score not implemented / not working
  6. Options menu not implemented / not working
  7. Fuel bar (yellow progress bar) don't have any function yet

But it's a playable game for testing and at this point that is its purpose :)

It's actually my first game so I hope you'll like it! In this alpha version I would like to get your feedback  - what to add or remove, is it too hard or too easy, etc... So don't hesitate to post a comment :)

Download .rar file, extract it, click on MILDAS icon and play! :)
